thread.title: Rain moves state softball to Saturday, Sunday
thread.title_full: Rain moves state softball to Saturday, Sunday

title: Rain moves state softball to Saturday, Sunday
text:
Rain moves state softball to Saturday, Sunday Friday state softball game times adjusted due to rain at Aurora Sports Park. Post to Facebook Rain moves state softball to Saturday, Sunday Friday state softball game times adjusted due to rain at Aurora Sports Park. Check out this story on coloradoan.com: http://noconow.co/1RYTcfM Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation Kevin Lytle, kevinlytle@coloradoan.com 10:52 a.m. MDT October 22, 2015 State softball games have been delayed due to rain. (Photo: Austin Humphreys/The Coloradoan) CONNECT 4 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The state softball tournament has been pushed back. 
Rain has force CHSAA and Aurora Sports Park — the host site — to move the tournament to a Saturday-Sunday format. 
First- and second-round games were scheduled for Friday. Those games will now be played Saturday, with semifinals and championship games on Sunday. 
The move means No. 5 Rocky Mountain play No. 12 Eaglecrest at 10 a.m. Saturday. No. 6 Fort Collins will play No. 11 Grandview at 12:15 p.m. No. 7 Fossil Ridge will play No. 10 Legend at 12:15 p.m. 
In 4A, No. 7 Windsor will face No. 10 Silver Creek at 12:15 p.m. 
Second-round games will be played at 2:30 p.m. Saturday. 
Follow sports reporter Kevin Lytle at twitter.com/Kevin_Lytle and at facebook.com/KevinSLytle. Read or Share this story: http://noconow.co/1RYTcfM TOP VIDEOS
